item.title: About Roger
item.description: I live in Atlanta, am married to Melissa, and am raising Francis, Avery, and Chase. Passions Family Travel Sailing / anything on the water Snowboarding Technology Experience I have focussed my professional life at the intersection of technology and supply chain. Stops CognitOps: 2020 Fortna: 2011-2020 Brightstar: 2009-2011 Adjoined | Kanbay | Capgemini: 2006-2009 University of Virginia. MS, BS Systems and Information Engineering: 2001-2006 Wyomissing Area High School: 2000
